results.title: Delayed drug-induced liver injury (DILI) and flare of chronic plaque psoriasis secondary to lisinopril use.

results.title: The association between ACE inhibitors and psoriasis based on the drug-targeted Mendelian randomization and real-world pharmacovigilance analyses.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: Our integrative study verified that ACEIs, especially @CHEMICAL_Ramipril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017257 @@@ramipril@@@, @CHEMICAL_trandolapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:C052035 @@@trandolapril@@@, @CHEMICAL_Perindopril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020913 @@@perindopril@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@, and @CHEMICAL_Enalapril @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004656 @@@enalapril@@@, tended to increase the risk of @<m>DISEASE_Psoriasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011565 @@@psoriasis@@@ statistically.

citations.NLM: Jin Q, Ren F, Song P. The association between ACE inhibitors and psoriasis based on the drug-targeted Mendelian randomization and real-world pharmacovigilance analyses. Expert Rev Clin Pharmacol. 2023 Dec 11;():1-8. PMID: 38078460

results.title: Psoriasis associated with ACE inhibitors: an analysis of the FAERS database.

results.title: Using semantic predications to uncover drug-drug interactions in clinical data.
results.text_hl: For example, our results suggest that the interaction of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@, an ACE inhibitor commonly prescribed for @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertension@@@, and the antidepressant @CHEMICAL_Sertraline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D020280 @@@sertraline@@@ can potentially increase the likelihood and possibly the severity of @<m>DISEASE_Psoriasis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011565 @@@psoriasis@@@.

citations.NLM: Zhang R, Cairelli MJ, Fiszman M, Rosemblat G, Kilicoglu H, Rindflesch TC, Pakhomov SV, Melton GB. Using semantic predications to uncover drug-drug interactions in clinical data. J Biomed Inform. 2014 Jun;49():134-47. PMID: 24448204
